Key Match Events: Julián Álvarez scored the opening goal for Argentina in the 22nd minute
Lionel Messi scored the second goal for Argentina in the 51st minute
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Messi commented on Argentina's impressive performance and their journey towards another final
Lionel Scaloni, Argentina's coach, emphasized the importance of enjoying every moment of their success
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, N.J.
Canada's star Alphonso Davies limped off in the 71st minute
Others: Argentina extended their unbeaten streak to 10 games
Canada had two shots on target but were unable to score
The match was played on a temporary grass surface that appeared heavy
